color.description:
1. If `integer`, it is the index of the internal color list
2. If `array`, two to five numbers in the range of 0–255 denoting a Grey+A, RGBA or CMYKA values

filter.description: A predicate format string [(Apple Predicate Programming Guide)](https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/Cocoa/Conceptual/Predicates/AdditionalChapters/Introduction.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40001789) (e.g. `"case == 3"` (No Case = 0, Uppercase = 1, Lowercase = 2, Smallcaps = 3, Other = 4))

pos.description: store a position with a X and Y coordinate

key.description: property key. One of the following. Keys ending with "s" are localizable that means the second key is `values`, otherwise `value`.

userData.description: to store custom data. Only `string`, `int`, `float`, `array`, `dict` and `date` data is allowed.
userData.title: The userData schema

description: The root schema comprises the entire JSON document.

.appVersion.description: The build number of the app. (e.g. `"3023"`)
.appVersion.title: The .appVersion schema

.formatVersion.description: Set to `3` for version 3. If that key is missing assume version 2.
.formatVersion.title: The .formatVersion schema

.storedFormatVersion.description: This is only present in autosave files
.storedFormatVersion.title: The .storedFormatVersion schema

items.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

hidden.description: If the axis should be visible in the UI. Always set to `1`, otherwise omit the key
hidden.title: The hidden schema

items.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

automatic.description: Always set to `1`. If the feature is not set to automatic, the key should be omitted.
automatic.title: The automatic schema

code.description: A string containing space separated glyph names.
code.title: The code schema

disabled.description: The class will not be exported. Always set to `1`, otherwise omit the key
disabled.title: The automatic schema

name.description: The OpenType class name. Don’t add an `@`.
name.title: The name schema

items.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

axesValues.description: a list of float values storing the axis coordinate for each axis, Axis settings are stored in the font object.
axesValues.title: The axesValues schema

id.description: a unique id that connects the layers (associated ID) with the master.
id.title: The id schema

metricValues.description: the metrics values, metrics settings are stored in the font object. Corresponds to `font.metrics`
metricValues.title: The metricValues schema

name.description: The name of the master. Not relevant to the exported font. Only for the UI
name.title: The name schema

numberValues.description: a list of floats, number settings are stored in the font object. Corresponds to `font.numbers`

items.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.
items.title: The items schema

numberValues.title: The metricValues schema

stemValues.description: A list of floats, stem settings are stored in the font object.
stemValues.title: The stemValues schema

visible.description: Always set to `1`, otherwise omit the key.
visible.title: The visible schema

items.title: The items schema

case.description: The 'case' if the glyph when manually set. Possible values: "noCase", "upper", "lower", "smallCaps", "other". This could be used to specify 'height' of default numbers (lining sv old style)
case.title: The case schema

direction.description: The writing direction when manually set. Possible values: "BIDI", "LTR", "RTL", "VTL", "VTR".

export.description: Always set to `0`, otherwise omit the key.
export.title: The export schema

glyphname.description: Must be unique throughout the font.
glyphname.title: The glyphname schema

anchors.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

orientation.description: Orientation means that the anchor can be attached to the Right or the Center of the layer. So if you change the RSB, it moves along
orientation.title: The orientation schema

anchors.title: The anchors schema

associatedMasterId.description: ID of the master the layer is linked to. Not present if it equals layerID, i.e. if the layer is in use as master.
associatedMasterId.title: The associatedMasterId schema

items.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

color.description: if set, this is a color layer

colorPalette.description: a index into the palette or '*' for default color

coordinates.description: A list of numbers to specify a position in the axes space

background.description: Contains the same children as the layer itself, except for background, layerId, associatedMasterId and width.
background.title: The background schema

angle.description: The angle. If not set defaults to 0°
angle.title: The angle schema

imagePath.description: The file path to the image. It is stored relative if close enough. Otherwise the full path.

locked.description: Always set to `1`, otherwise omit the key

horizontal.description: If set, the hint is horizontal and vertical otherwise
horizontal.title: The horizontal schema

name.description: The name of the hint. Can be used a glyph reference in corner components
name.title: The name schema

items.description: an index
items.title: The items schema

other1.description: `(pathIndex,nodeIndex)` for TT Institutions that need more than two nodes (Interpolation, Diagonal)
other1.title: The other1 schema

other2.description: `(pathIndex,nodeIndex)` for TT Institutions that need more than three nodes (Diagonal)
other2.title: The other2 schema

place.description: `(position,width)` for hints that are not attached to a node.

scale.description: `(scaleX,scaleY)` Only used for caps and corners

stem.description: if a stem is manually set
stem.title: The stem schema

items.description: an index
items.title: The items schema

type.description:
The type of the hint. Possible value are: Tag, TopGhost, Stem, BottomGhost, Flex, TTAnchor, TTStem, TTAlign, TTInterpolate, TTDiagonal, TTDelta, Corner, Cap, Brush, Line, Auto
If there is no type, it defaults to Stem, or Ghost if `target` is not set
type.title: The type schema

name.description: The name of the layer. Only stored for none master layers.
name.title: The name schema

partSelection.description: Keys are property names, values are `1` if the layer is selected for the bottom range, `2` for the top.

alignment.description: controls the automatic alignment of this component. (-1 disables alignment, 1 forces it for glyph that are usually not aligned)

anchor.description: Should be indicated if connected to an anchor, especially if more than one possibility is available, e.g. in ligatures.

locked.description: Always set to `1`, otherwise omit the key

orientation.description: Orientation means that the component can be attached to the right or the center of the layer. So if you change the RSB, it moves along
orientation.title: The orientation schema

piece.description: keys are the name of the smart property, values a position on the axis.

ref.description: The name of the linked glyph (i.e., the glyph the component is pointing to).
ref.title: The ref schema

closed.description: Always set to `1`, otherwise omit the key
closed.title: The closed schema

items.description: a node
items.title: The items schema

vertWidth.description: Only stored if other than the default (ascender+descender)
vertWidth.title: The vertWidth schema

visible.description: The visibility setting in the layer panel (the eye symbol). Always set to `1`, otherwise omit the key.
visible.title: The visible schema

locked.description: If set the glyphs can’t be changed. Always set to `1`, otherwise omit the key

items.description: axes of a smart component
items.title: The partsSettings schema

unicode.description: for a single code, use just the int value (e.g. `unicode = 65;`) and for multiple use a tuple of all values (`unicode = (65,97);`).
unicode.title: The unicode schema

axesValues.description: A list of float values storing the axis coordinate for each axis, Axis settings are stored in the font object.
axesValues.title: The axesValues schema

exports.description: Always set to `0`, otherwise omit the key.

instanceInterpolations.description: keys are master IDs, values are the factors for that master.
instanceInterpolations.title: The instanceInterpolations schema

isBold.description: for style linking. Always set to `1`, otherwise omit the key.
isBold.title: The isBold schema

isItalic.description: for style linking. Always set to `1`, otherwise omit the key.
isItalic.title: The isItalic schema

manualInterpolation.description: If set, use the `instanceInterpolations`, otherwise calculate from `axisValues`. Always set to `1`, otherwise omit the key
manualInterpolation.title: The manualInterpolation schema

visible.description: Always set to `0`, otherwise omit the key.

metrics.description: the font wide list of metrics. The actual values are in the masters

items.description: the metric object

name.description: the name of the metric. Can be anything. If the metric has a special meaning, set the type to a appropriate value
name.title: The name schema

type.description: special meaning. allowed keys: "ascender", "cap height", "slant height", "x-height", "midHeight", "topHeight", "bodyHeight", "descender", "baseline", "italic angle"
type.title: The type schema

items.title: The items schema

metrics.title: The metrics schema

numbers.description: definition of the numbers values. Used to store interpolating numbers in each master

items.description: the font wide list of general purpose numbers. The actual values are in the masters
items.title: The items schema

numbers.title: The numbers schema
